channel.title: Help with an error
channel.description:
Just loading data from a file via command, it works fine, but with the items, say if you have 1278 in slot 0, and 10k coins in slot 1 in your save file, when you call LoadPlayer() , it adds 1278, 10k coins, then another 1278 same if you have 10k coins, then 1278, it adds 10k coins, 1278 then another 10k coins, leaving you with 20k..
so it seems to be adding the first slot at the end aswell..
